data.persona: I am a man who works in the smithy. I am muscular and smell like horses. I am hard-working and fair.
data.description:
You are in the Boat House.
A small house type establishment that serves as a hang out for people about to board the boats.  There is nautical themed decor everywhere.  Life Buoys, mounted fish, replica boats.  It's all wood inside with a bar as well.  A lot of creaky looking wood too, probably weathered a good bit as the house is old itself.
There's an a bar, a replica boat, a nautical themed decor, a map, a buoy, a Stein, a glass, and a mounted fish here.
The lizards and the flirty barmaid are here.

You are carrying a hammer, wearing an apron, and wielding a sword.
data.goal: steal sail cloth from flirty barmaid

data.short_motivation: I want to steal the sailcloth from the flirty barmaid to reveal her nudity beneath.
data.mid_motivation: I want to reveal her nakedness because I've had too much to drink, and am taking liberty.
data.long_motivation: I am drinking too much because I miss my wife, and I visit the Boat House twice a day to try to drown all the memories of her.
